attributes.action: Create a Maglev rail system going from London, into Birmingham where it will stop off then up to Glasgow.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK needs to come into the future, maglev can do this and will shorten times from London to Glasgow to an estimate of two hours. It has already worked wonders in china, lets be the second country to have this new futuristic transport.
